mapper.select: SELECT substr(login_email, 1, instr(login_email, '@') - 1) AS login_email, board_no, board_title, board_content, replace(substr(create_date, 6, 5), '-', '.') AS create_date FROM announcements_board ORDER BY board_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into announcements_board(login_email, board_title, board_content) select #{login_email},#{board_title},#{board_content}
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, login_email, board_title, board_content, create_date FROM announcements_board WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
select board_no, login_email, board_title, board_content, create_date from announcements_board where board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.update: update announcements_board set login_email=login_email, board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content} where board_no=#{board_no}
